This reminds you of these events from your past: 
I received a command to search for interstellar travel ideas, and my latest search returned articles on the Breakthrough Starshot project, Daedalus spacecraft, and using black holes for interstellar travel. These articles and previous ones discuss various propulsion schemes, including nuclear thermal propulsion engines and ion thrusters. Interstellar travel is technically possible but challenging.
